newsitem.title: JAPAN: JGB market closed for national holiday.
newsitem.headline: JGB market closed for national holiday.

text.p: *Japanese government bond market in Tokyo is closed on Monday for national holiday. Trade will resume on Tuesday.
*Key June JGB futures ended up 0.10 at 125.50 on Friday.
*Yield of benchmark cash 182nd JGB ended at 2.300 percent on Friday, down from Thursday's close of 2.325 percent.
